content:
sunfishcode opened PR #2926 from sunfishcode/remove-test-all-sh to main:

test-all.sh isn't run in CI, and is out of date with respect to what we
do run in CI, so remove it so that we don't have to awkwardly maintain it.

Alternatively, I've also rebased and minimally brought https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/1397 into working order in case anyone prefers to keep it. But at this moment it seems to me better to just remove the script altogether.
<!--

Please ensure that the following steps are all taken care of before submitting
the PR.

  • [ ] This has been discussed in issue #..., or if not, please tell us why
    here.

  • [ ] A short description of what this does, why it is needed; if the
    description becomes long, the matter should probably be discussed in an issue
    first.

  • [ ] This PR contains test cases, if meaningful.

  • [ ] A reviewer from the core maintainer team has been assigned for this PR.
    If you don't know who could review this, please indicate so. The list of
    suggested reviewers on the right can help you.

Please ensure all communication adheres to the code of conduct.
-->
